def merge(left, right):
    global d
    result = []
    i ,j = 0, 0
    multiplier = 0
    while(i < len(left) and j < len(right)):
        if (left[i] <= right[j]):
            result.append(left[i])
            i = i + 1
            d += multiplier
        else:
            result.append(right[j])
            j = j + 1
            multiplier += 1
            
    result += left[i:]
    d += multiplier * (len(left) - i)
    result += right[j:]
    
    return result

def mergesort(list):
    global d
    if len(list) < 2:
        return list
    else:
        middle = len(list) / 2
        left = mergesort(list[:middle])
        right = mergesort(list[middle:])
        return merge(left, right)

num_tests = int(raw_input())
heights = raw_input()
heights = heights.split(' ')
heights = map(int, heights)

d = 0
mergesort(heights)
print d
